newsitem.title: UK: Danzas moves its Glasgow base.
newsitem.headline: Danzas moves its Glasgow base.

text.p: Danzas, the international logistics and freight forwarding company, has moved its Glasgow base to larger premises, a company statement said on Wednesday.

The move to the new 10,000 sq ft logistics centre will result in the creation of some jobs and all Danzas employees from the existing site will be transferring to the new premises, the statement added.
A new fleet of vehicles has been purchased for the new centre.
Opening the new centre forms part of an ambitious plan to double UK turnover to more than 157 million stg by 2001, it added.
